report.title: Blindness
report.author: Faith
report.bodytext: I was offered imported Absinthe by a friend with a flask. I had roughly one shot. I went on to have a bit of bourbon and then went to bed for the night. /n /n I woke up the next morning completely blind, and it took me almost 12hrs to regain my full eyesight. /n /n Turns out Wormwood is in the same family as Menthol, which is something I'm mildly allergic to -- Wormwood I'm more severely allergic to. I literally could not see behind the length of my arm all day.
